hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##the Thieves' Hideout## has #0# major items.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: Are you stuck? Try asking for help in our Discord server or check out our Wiki!

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #Market Bazaar#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Fire Temple#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Iron Boots# can be found at #Zora's Fountain#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: This is a haiku&Five syllables then seven&Five more to finish

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##the Temple of Time## has #1# major item.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Underwater Left Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #the Eyedrops#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #Arrows (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple GS Sun on Floor Room

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Heavy Block Fourth Chest

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that plundering #the Market# is a foolish choice.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #a Strength Upgrade# can be found at #Zora's Fountain#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Forest Temple Compass# and #an Ice Trap#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Bomb Bag#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that ##Hyrule Castle## has #1# major item.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Huge Rupee# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Spirit Temple#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
